thread.title: Spivey Hall Receives $25,000 Grant from the Charles Loridans Foundation (Clayton State University)
thread.title_full: Spivey Hall Receives $25,000 Grant from the Charles Loridans Foundation (Clayton State University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Spivey Hall Receives $25,000 Grant from the Charles Loridans Foundation (Clayton State University)
text: ( Source : Clayton State University ) Morrow , GA--Clayton State University 's Spivey Hall , the Southeast 's premier recital hall renowned internationally for its superior acoustics and the excellence of its classical, jazz and world music
